      • registerBluetoothStateListener

        public void registerBluetoothStateListener(IABluetoothStateListener bluetoothStateListener)
        • Register listener of the mobile phone bluetooth,if the mobile phone bluetooth status changed, the callback will return the state[open or close]

        • 注册手机系统蓝牙开关状态的监听[开/关]
        参数:
        bluetoothStateListener -
        • listener of the mobile phone bluetooth
        • 系统蓝牙开关状态的监听,回调参数中openOrClosed等于true表示开,等于false表示关

      • registerConnectStatusListener

        public void registerConnectStatusListener(java.lang.String mac,
                                          IABleConnectStatusListener bleConnectStatusListener)
        • Register listener of device connnect status[Disconnect/Connect]

        • 注册设备连接状态的监听[断开/连接]
        参数:
        mac -
        • device mac address
        • 设备地址
        bleConnectStatusListener -
        • the listener of device connnect status,if callback status equals Constants.STATUS_CONNECTED is means connect,and status equals Constants.STATUS_DISCONNECTED means disconnect
        • 设备连接状态的监听,回调参数中status等于Constants.STATUS_CONNECTED表示连接,等于Constants.STATUS_DISCONNECTED表示关闭

      • connectDevice

        public void connectDevice(java.lang.String mac,
                          java.lang.String deviceName,
                          IConnectResponse connectResponse,
                          INotifyResponse bleNotifyResponse)
        • Connect the device

        • 连接设备
        参数:
        mac -
        • device mac address
        • 需要连接的设备地址
        deviceName -
        • device Name
        • 需要连接的设备名字
        connectResponse -
        • the connect state response,you can't call confirmDevicePwd function in this function.
        • 连接状态的回调,先返回连接状态,连接成功后,会返回蓝牙通信状态的回调;即使回调成功,也不能在此执行密码验证操作!!!
        bleNotifyResponse -
        • the notify state response,if respose state equals Code.REQUEST_SUCCESS,you can call confirmDevicePwd function in this function
        • 蓝牙通信状态的回调,此回调在connectResponse之后被调用;若回调成功,在此执行密码验证操作!!!

                                       EnumUIOrientation uiOrientation,
                                       OnUirientationDataListener onUirientationDataListener)
        • set the screen orientation info

        • 设置屏幕方向信息
        参数:

        • the response of write oprate

        • 你要设置的屏幕方向

      • startListenTestData

        public void startListenTestData(IBleWriteResponse bleWriteResponse,
                                OnACKDataListener onACKDataListener)
        • start listen test data

        • 开始监听测试数据
        参数:
        bleWriteResponse -
        • the response of write oprate
        • 写入操作的监听
        onACKDataListener -
        • the listener will tell you whehter is success about start listening
        • 此操作的回调结果，告诉你开始成功没有

      • setLightDataCallBack

        public void setLightDataCallBack(boolean isOpenNotify,
                                 OnAdcDataListener lightDataCallBack)
        • disconnect the device

        • 断开蓝牙
        参数:
        isOpenNotify -
        • the notify of light data，the light data is for draw the testing curve line
        • 波形数据的监听,波形数据用于绘制波形
        lightDataCallBack -
        • the listener the light data
        • 波形数据的回调
